resources.string: Generate party with the selected heroes
Every party needs a name.\nYour friends need to know which party to join and I need a name to store party data you can later retrieve.
Tell your friends to join your party from the main menu. They will appear below.
Looks like someone else is creating a party with the same name. I will use the name you have provided but I must use a different one to let your friends join. Tell them to look for
Something prevented creation of the "listen" socket. This is required to let other devices talk to me. Without it, I cannot even start creating the party.
I cannot create the "heroes gather here" service. There\'s nothing I can do about it.\n(Error %1$s)
Looks like the Network Service Discovery is unavailable. I require this thing to let your friends join the party.
